meanings.definition: At regular intervals; from time to time.
meanings.sent1: She checks her phone periodically to see if she has any messages.
meanings.sent2: The bus arrives periodically at the bus stop every hour.
meanings.sent3: The cat periodically pokes its head out from under the bed to check if the coast is clear.
meanings.sent4: The stars shine periodically in the night sky, like flickering candles.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock beeps periodically, reminding her to wake up.

meanings.sent1: The pendulum swings periodically back and forth in the old clock.
meanings.sent2: The waves crash periodically against the shore, creating a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The robot periodically beeps as it moves around the room, like a mechanical dance.
meanings.sent4: The music plays periodically in the background, setting the mood for the evening.
meanings.sent5: The sun rises periodically, painting the sky with vibrant colors.
